Pema Sutta：1．Pema SuttaOf affection can be born both affection and ill will； likewise of ill will．Freedom from these states is acquired by the development of the jhānas．A．ii．213ff．

2．Pema （or Sāriputta Kotthita） SuttaA conversation between Sāriputta and Kotthita as to why the Buddha has said nothing regarding the existence or otherwise of a Tathāgata after death．S．iv．387．
